attributes.additional_details: I think that thanks to the cuts in the Civil Service and the Police, Britain as a Nation need protection from the unrest that we have now, we should have the Army, the Police and the Justce System protecting the law abbiding people and the recent riots have made the every day people afraid its is a disgrace that these people can loot ,set fire to peoples lively hoods and walk away scott free thanks to David Cameron and Nick Clegg. We have no Army and we should have tankls and Army looking after us and no back up from the Police
